title: Stephen Colbert Bans Kanye West From ‘The Late Show’
description: Colbert said his jurisdiction extended into the northern half of Times Square, and that he was “banning Kanye from coming north of Bubba Gump Shrimp.”
dc:creator: Trish Bendix
category: Late Show with Stephen Colbert (TV Program)
The Daily Show with Trevor Noah (TV Program)
